name: Dluur
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speek

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dluur can breathe air and water.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the dluur remains motionless in water under the surface, it is indistinguishable from a normal patch of lure weed.

trait.name: Lure
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 60 feet of the dluur and can see the dluur’s illicium, the dluur can force the creature to make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw if the dluur isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed until the end of its next turn. While charmed, the creature must immediately use its reaction, if available, to move as close as its speed allows toward the dluur. The effect ends for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dluur makes two claws attacks. It can use Acid Spit in place of any melee attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 10 ({@dice 3d6}) acid damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 3 (1d6) acid damage on a failure or ending the recurring acid damage on a success. A lesser restoration spell cast on the target also ends the recurring acid damage.

reactions.name: Psychic Assault
entries: When a creature the dluur can see starts its turn charmed within 60 feet of the aberration, the dluur can attack its mind with psychic powers. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 7 ({@dice 2d6}) psychic damage and be stunned until the end of its turn.

name: Black Root Vörsa
languages: understands Abyssal, Druidic and Sylvan but doesn't speak

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The vörsa's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The vörsa can innately cast the following spells, requireing no material components:

trait.name: Magic Attacks
entries: The vörsa's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The vörsa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the vörsa is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1d4 hours and emerges from the roots of its blighted tree unless a {@spell greater restoration} or {@spell wish} spell is cast on the tree.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vörsa makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) slashing damage plus 14 (3d8) necrotic damage.

action.name: Life Drain {@recharge 5}
entries: The vörsa targets up to three creatures that it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 17 Consitution saving throw or take 21 (6d6) necrotic damage, and the vörsa regains hitpoints equal to the total damage dealt to all targets.

name: Vargheist
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The vargheist has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the vargheist is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and hits it with a melee weapon attack, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is knocked prone and stunned until the end of its next turn. While it is prone and stunned, the vargheist can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The vargheist doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The vargheist takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vargheist makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 ({@dice 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vargheist can grapple the target (escape DC 16).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature that is grappled by the vargheist, incapacitated or restrained. Hit: 11 ({@dice 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vargheist regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vargheist regainst 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the vargheist takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vargheist's next turn.

entries: The vargheist takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vargheist can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 ({@dice 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vargheist can grapple the target (escape DC 16).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature that is grappled by the vargheist, incapacitated or restrained. Hit: 11 ({@dice 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vargheist regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the vargheist's choice that is within 120 feet of the vargheist and aware of it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the vargheist's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

name: Ekimarra
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The ekimarra can't use its blindsight while deafened

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The ekimarra regainst 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the ekimarra takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the ekimarra's next turn.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the ekimarra has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Widsom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ekimarra makes three melee weapon attacks, or two and turns invisible. It can only make one bite attack on its turn.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 ({@dice 2d12 + 6}) slashing damage. If the target is not undead or a construct, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution Saving throw or lose 7 ({@damage 2d6}) hit points at the start of each of its turns. Each time the ekimarra hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage increases by 7 ({@damage 2d6}). Any creature can take an action to staunch the wound with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.
Instead of dealing damage, the ekimarra can grapple the target (escape DC 16).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature that is grappled by the ekimarra, incapacitated or restrained. Hit: 12 ({@dice 1d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the ekimarra regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The ekimarra magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the ekimarra wears or carries is invisible with it.

legendary.name: Escape
entries: The ekimarra turns invisible and moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Claws (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The ekimarra makes one attack with its claws.

legendary.name: Cruel Slaughter (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The ekimarra makes an attack with its claws against one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or die. If the target dies, each creature of the ekimarra's choice that is within 60 feet of it and able to see it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the ekimarra for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature is incapacitated, can't understand what others say, can't read, and speaks only in gibberish. The DM controls the creature's movement, which is erratic. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the ekimarra's Cruel Slaughter for the next 24 hours.
